title: FoodCode
description: The FoodCode is a React-based application experience for browsing menus, carts, payments, and admin.

title: Hotels-Rooftop-Blog
description: This is a blog project focused on hotels with rooftop pools. It's built using React, Redux Toolkit, React Router, and Tailwind CSS.

title: ShopCart
description: This is a fully functional e-commerce website built using React,React-Bootstrap,Firebase and SwiperJS.

title: Bank-Calculation App
description: This React application provides a fully functional loan calculator to calculate monthly payments and total interest.

title: Task Manager
description: This is a Task Manager app to boost your productivity to create, read, update, delete al of your daily task

title: Tic-Tac-Toe
description: This is a beautiful and user-friendly implementation of the classic Tic Tac Toe game using React and Tailwind CSS.
